column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////My friend and I arrived for dinner early Saturday evening (around 5)
column2: so we had no trouble getting a table. I ordered the Tonkatsu Assari Ramen and he ordered the Spicy Miso Ramen
column3: plus Japanese curry with rice on the side. The curry was delicious
column4: which got my hopes up for the ramen.
